rev.desc.rev.desc: Recompile
Added the following expression to the 'build.summary.0' panel:
$L.current.item.qty=nullsub(default.qty in $L.model,1)
Changed the following expression on the 'build.summary.0' panel:

From: if ($L.y>0) then ($L.qty=nullsub($L.y in component.qty in $L.parent, 1);6 in $L.workcntr in data in $L.work=$L.qty*$L.parent.qty;30 in $L.workcntr in data in $L.work=$L.y in component.group in $L.parent)

To: if ($L.y>0) then ($L.qty=nullsub($L.y in component.qty in $L.parent, 1);6 in $L.workcntr in data in $L.work=$L.qty*$L.parent.qty;30 in $L.workcntr in data in $L.work=$L.y in component.group in $L.parent;$L.unique.total.qty=$L.qty*$L.parent.qty*$L.current.item.qty)
Changed the following expression on the 'build.summary.1' panel:
from: if nullsub(evaluate(create.unique in $L.model), false) then (6 in $L.workcntr in data in $L.work=1;($L.y in component.qty in $L.parent)-=1)
to: if nullsub(evaluate(create.unique in $L.model), false) then (6 in $L.workcntr in data in $L.work=1;($L.y in component.qty in $L.parent)-=1;($L.unique.total.qty)-=1)
Added an exit to the panel 'check.create.unique':
Added an exit to build.summary.1
with the following condition: evaluate(create.unique in $L.model) and $L.unique.total.qty>0
Added the following expression to panel 'reset.to.trap.cntr':
if null(prompt.message in $L.parent) then ($optmsg4=scmsg(319, "ocm", {str(part.no in $L.parent), str(part.desc in $L.parent)})) else ($optmsg4=evaluate(prompt.message in $L.parent))
Removed call to obsolete function current.scroll()
RAD ocml.select.co.sub
Panel mark.cursor.pos.2
Added
if ($L.xy<=$L.xz) then if (not null(cursor.field.name()) and not null($L.xy)) then cursor.field.name.set(cursor.field.name(), $L.xy)
Fixed an issue where a parent was not correctly set when the internal parent had a number less than the bundle parent. Moved the check to before the internal number was decremented.
Added priority field to the sort array on the select.parts panel.
Moved the sort to after the display so that items are displayed in part.no order.

If there are 3 dependent groups A > B > C (where A is dependent on B, B is dependent on C), and B is optional; if no item in B is ordered then items in group A will inherit dependency on group C ( A > C ).
Modified to sort groups correctly.
Fixed a problem where nested parents cause incorrect parent line numbers.
Fixed a problem where the parent of an item would be incorrect if optional items were selected or deselected.
Fixed a problem that caused the parent to sometimes be incremented incorrectly, resulting in a circular dependencies message.
Fixed so that the overall defaults option is only set by the first model record.
Modified the $L.defaults parameter so it wont propagate to children.
added debug parameter...
scmsg

descript.descript: Recompile
Added the following expression to the 'start' panel:
$L.unique.total.qty=$L.parent.qty
Changed the following expression on the 'build.summary.1' panel:
from: if nullsub(evaluate(create.unique in $L.model), false) then (6 in $L.workcntr in data in $L.work=1;($L.y in component.qty in $L.parent)-=1)
to: if nullsub(evaluate(create.unique in $L.model), false) then (6 in $L.workcntr in data in $L.work=1;($L.y in component.qty in $L.parent)-=1;($L.unique.total.qty)-=1)
Added an exit to the panel 'check.create.unique':
Added an exit to build.summary.1
with the following condition: evaluate(create.unique in $L.model) and $L.unique.total.qty>0
Added the following expression to panel 'reset.to.trap.cntr':
if null(prompt.message in $L.parent) then ($optmsg4=scmsg(319, "ocm", {str(part.no in $L.parent), str(part.desc in $L.parent)})) else ($optmsg4=evaluate(prompt.message in $L.parent))
Removed call to obsolete function current.scroll()
RAD ocml.select.co.sub
Panel mark.cursor.pos.2
Added
if ($L.xy<=$L.xz) then if (not null(cursor.field.name()) and not null($L.xy)) then cursor.field.name.set(cursor.field.name(), $L.xy)
Fixed an issue where a parent was not correctly set when the internal parent had a number less than the bundle parent. Moved the check to before the internal number was decremented.
Added priority field to the sort array on the select.parts panel.
Moved the sort to after the display so that items are displayed in part.no order.

If there are 3 dependent groups A > B > C (where A is dependent on B, B is dependent on C), and B is optional; if no item in B is ordered then items in group A will inherit dependency on group C ( A > C ).
Modified to sort groups correctly.
Fixed a problem where nested parents cause incorrect parent line numbers.
Fixed a problem where the parent of an item would be incorrect if optional items were selected or deselected.
Fixed a problem that caused the parent to sometimes be incremented incorrectly, resulting in a circular dependencies message.
Fixed so that the overall defaults option is only set by the first model record.
Modified the $L.defaults parameter so it wont propagate to children.
added debug parameter...
scmsg
